org.gbif.registry.metadata.contact

Class ContactAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.registry.metadata.contact.ContactAdapter

  • public class ContactAdapter
extends Object
    Adapt the Dataset Contact list for what metadata documents generally want.
    Author:
    cgendreau

    • Method Detail

      • getAssociatedParties

        public List<org.gbif.api.model.registry.Contact> getAssociatedParties()
        Get the list of AssociatedParties. This is defined as all non-primary Contact.
        Returns:
        first preferred ResourceCreator found or null if none were found

      • getResourceCreator

        public org.gbif.api.model.registry.Contact getResourceCreator()
        Get the ResourceCreator Contact. This is defined as the first primary Contact of type ContactType.ORIGINATOR.
        Returns:
        first preferred ResourceCreator found or null if none were found

      • formatContactName

        public static String formatContactName(org.gbif.api.model.registry.Contact contact)
        Format the name of the contact as "FirstName LastName".
        Parameters:
        contact -
        Returns:
        formatted name or "" if the contact is null or empty

      • getAdministrativeContact

        public org.gbif.api.model.registry.Contact getAdministrativeContact()
        Get the AdministrativeContact Contact. This is defined as the first primary Contact of type ContactType.ADMINISTRATIVE_POINT_OF_CONTACT.
        Returns:
        first preferred AdministrativeContact found or null if none were found

      • getFilteredContacts

        public List<org.gbif.api.model.registry.Contact> getFilteredContacts(org.gbif.api.vocabulary.ContactType... types)
        Filter contacts based on the provided contact types. Filtering is done by the getFirstPreferredType(org.gbif.api.vocabulary.ContactType) method.
        Parameters:
        types -
        Returns:
        filtered contacts or an empty list if none matched

      • getFirstPreferredType

        public org.gbif.api.model.registry.Contact getFirstPreferredType(org.gbif.api.vocabulary.ContactType type)
        Get the first primary Contact for the provided type.
        Returns:
        first preferred type contact found or null if nothing were found
